title: Technical Writer Intern
summary: I surveyed users, carried out card sorting and tree testing studies, and developed user journeys and personas to re-design the site architecture for the internal documentation of one of Google’s in-house content management systems. Along the way, I wrote, revised, and published how-tos, guides, and reference docs.

title: Web Editor
location: Wisconsin Academy of Sciences, Arts & Letters -- Madison, WI
summary: As web editor, I developed a new site architecture and wireframes for critical pages while designing a new content strategy for a multi-faceted organization, helping users discover content across program areas. I also contributed to a style guide for digital content and edited content for clarity, cohesion, and correctness.

title: Digital Editor Intern
location: Wisconsin Academy of Sciences, Arts & Letters -- Madison, WI
summary: I wrote and edited articles for Wisconsin People & Ideas magazine while researching and implementing best practices for usability on this organizations’ website..
